name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Ruby Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, specializing in building scalable and secure applications using **Ruby**, **Ruby on Rails**, and modern development practices. Proficient in implementing **TDD**, **continuous integration**, and **continuous delivery** to enhance software quality and delivery speed. Experienced in working with databases such as **PostgreSQL** and developing **RESTful APIs** while ensuring compliance with secure coding standards.

Skilled in using **Git**, **GitHub**, and **GitLab** for version control and collaboration within **agile** teams, leveraging **DevOps** practices and **infrastructure-as-code** for efficient deployment. My background also includes expertise in **React**, **TypeScript**, and cloud services such as **AWS**, delivering AI/ML-enabled functionalities and automated workflows.

I am committed to clean code principles, automated testing (unit, integration, system testing), and code documentation, which have contributed to the development of enterprise solutions in fast-paced and remote work environments.
